title: Worlds missions not showing up
body: Missions are not coming up in my tab for the worlds quest line. I haven't completed any so it's not like I've 'run out' for the week. Is it just me having this problem?

replies.body: Having the same issue here, completed the 2 first missions and still waiting for others to show. I regularly restart my client. It does show off that i completed 3 missions thought, because i did the pick'em one.

I am having the same issue. I completed 4 of them and now none are showing up. I thought maybe it was because i finished them for the day so i logged back in yesterday and still nothing, same with today. Seems odd to go 3 days without any missions.
You most likely just need to relog into the client in order to let it refresh itself with the new missions. It's always good to give that client a break and close it when not playing.
